propDescriptions.children: This prop isn't supported. Use the component prop if you need to change the children structure.
propDescriptions.classes: Sobrescreve ou extende os estilos aplicados para o componente. Veja a API CSS abaixo para maiores detalhes.
propDescriptions.label: The label element.
propDescriptions.showLabel:
If true, the BottomNavigationAction will show its label. By default, only the selected BottomNavigationAction inside BottomNavigation will show its label.
The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent BottomNavigation component.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.value: You can provide your own value. Otherwise, we fallback to the child position index.
